text: Smarana karuna, yedina tini tomaderake samabeta karabena samabesa dine sedina habe lokasanera dina [1]. Ara ye allahara upara imana rakhe ebam satkaja kare tini tara papasamuha mocana karabena ebam take prabesa karabena jannatasamuhe, yara padadese nadi prabahita, sekhane tara habe cirasthayi. Eta'i mahasaphalya
